TopicTitle: One million posts on the forum, wow...

Articles.Content:
Good job, forum. I bet this day would've been sooner if April didn't happen.

Anyway, hope this doesn't count as spam/break the forum rules.

Thanks, and congrats on 1 million people posting their threads, comments, and concerns on the forum

That is all.

Hopefully this is the millionth post

(Proof. Taken after this was posted)

Edited March 12, 2014 by TheCanadianVendingMachine
Very interseting. You sure you didn't get the 999,999 post and someone else got 1million? Either way, 1k posts.. wow.
Well, I pressed submit post on 999, 999. Also, I wrote that about 700 posts ago.
